explanation: [0-0] The video begins in a yellow circular arena where a woman in a blue dress is tied up with ropes and hanging mid-air. Two red-skinned demon warriors stand on either side of the arena's edge, glaring at the woman. There is a yellow watermark in the lower left corner.

[0-8] The woman drops down a bit, tears in her eyes, and a speech bubble appears saying, "Help me!", pleading for help from the outside world. The camera then zooms out, revealing five more demon warriors around them. In the center of the arena, a blue-skinned warrior and a red-skinned warrior appear on either side of the woman. The blue warrior has a combat power of 3, while the red warrior has a combat power of 10. The caption "Level 1" pops up at the top of the screen. The player selects the blue warrior's "x2" button, and the blue warrior's combat power becomes 6. The player then selects the blue warrior's "+3" button, and the blue warrior's combat power becomes 9.
